descr_service: With a degree in Computer Science and nearly fifteen years' professional experience, I have learned the skills and built the confidence necessary to use any language in any environment to solve almost any challenge.

Emphasizing abstraction and componentization, I favor an enterprise services architecture in which standardized components are integrated, reducing net complexity and increasing operational efficiency.
Whether you need to integrate two known systems, or discover a new system that fulfills your requirements, my background with developing information systems solutions can help.

How else to describe converting otherwise meaningless data into priceless information, using the unique blend of scripting, development, hacking, and data science-related disciplines I've developed throughout my career?
